title: I think it is time we acknowledged the elephant in the room. GD's sexism.
body:
Dear GD,

We all love it here in GD. It is a kind and caring community. But there is a problem that we all would like to pretend doesn't exist: GD is sexist. This is **proven** by the daily weeb threads that are posted, as well as posters having names that objectify women in a manner most weeb-like. GD needs to either post weeb threads with sexualized pics of Singed and Gragas, or stop weebifying their "waifus". I know this post is likely to be ignored, but I feel strongly on the subject and could not sit idly by. 

That is all.
